body.p: Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Black Macklin. Father of Emma Macklin, Charles Macklin, Anna Macklin, Stephen Macklin, and Sally Macklin. Farmer in Franklin County in 1860. Owned twenty-three enslaved persons in Franklin County in 1860.
